statements.update: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] WHERE [Id]=#Id#) UPDATE [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] SET [Category]=#Category#, [Name]=#Name#, [Unit]=#Unit#, [GroupName]=#GroupName#, [ControlId]=#ControlId#, [ControlType]=#ControlType#, [Placeholder]=#Placeholder#, [ControlDataSource]=#ControlDataSource#, [ControlMaxLength]=#ControlMaxLength#, [ControlCssClass]=#ControlCssClass#, [ControlStyle]=#ControlStyle#, [ControlValidateRule]=#ControlValidateRule#, [Sort]=#Sort#, [ModifyUserId]=#ModifyUserId#, [ModifyDateTime]=GETDATE() WHERE [Id]=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] ( [Id], [Category], [Name], [Unit], [GroupName], [ControlId], [ControlType], [Placeholder], [ControlDataSource], [ControlMaxLength], [ControlCssClass], [ControlStyle], [ControlValidateRule], [Sort], [CreateUserId], [CreateDateTime] ) VALUES ( NEWID(), #Category#, #Name#, #Unit#, #GroupName#, #ControlId#, #ControlType#, #Placeholder#, #ControlDataSource#, #ControlMaxLength#, #ControlCssClass#, #ControlStyle#, #ControlValidateRule#, #Sort#, #CreateUserId#, GETDATE() )
statements.select: SELECT DISTINCT([GroupName]) FROM [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] WHERE [Category]=#value# AND [GroupName] IS NOT NULL

SELECT TOP 1 a.[Id] AS Id, a.[Category] AS Category, a.[Name] AS Name, a.[Unit] AS Unit, a.[GroupName] AS GroupName, a.[ControlId] AS ControlId, a.[ControlType] AS ControlType, a.[Placeholder] AS Placeholder, a.[ControlDataSource] AS ControlDataSource, a.[ControlMaxLength] AS ControlMaxLength, a.[ControlCssClass] AS ControlCssClass, a.[ControlStyle] AS ControlStyle, a.[ControlValidateRule] AS ControlValidateRule, a.[Sort] AS Sort, a.[CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, u1.[Name] AS CreateUserName, a.[CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, a.[ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, u2.[Name] AS ModifyUserName, a.[ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime FROM [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] a LEFT JOIN [RBAC].[User] u1 ON a.CreateUserId=u1.Id LEFT JOIN [RBAC].[User] u2 ON a.ModifyUserId=u2.Id WHERE a.[Id]=#value#

SELECT a.[Id] AS Id, a.[Name] AS Name, a.[Unit] AS Unit, a.[GroupName] AS GroupName, a.[ControlId] AS ControlId, a.[ControlType] AS ControlType, a.[Placeholder] AS Placeholder, a.[ControlDataSource] AS ControlDataSource, a.[ControlMaxLength] AS ControlMaxLength, a.[ControlCssClass] AS ControlCssClass, a.[ControlStyle] AS ControlStyle, a.[ControlValidateRule] AS ControlValidateRule, a.[Sort] AS Sort, b.[Value] AS Value FROM [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] a LEFT JOIN [Dynamic].[ExtensionPropertyInstance] b ON a.Id=b.ExtensionPropertyId AND b.EntityId=#EntityId# WHERE [Category]=#Category# ORDER BY Sort ASC,GroupName DESC

WITH CTE AS( SELECT a.[Id] AS Id, a.[Category] AS Category, a.[Name] AS Name, a.[Unit] AS Unit, a.[GroupName] AS GroupName, a.[ControlId] AS ControlId, a.[ControlType] AS ControlType, a.[Placeholder] AS Placeholder, a.[ControlDataSource] AS ControlDataSource, a.[ControlMaxLength] AS ControlMaxLength, a.[ControlCssClass] AS ControlCssClass, a.[ControlStyle] AS ControlStyle, a.[ControlValidateRule] AS ControlValidateRule, a.[Sort] AS Sort, a.[CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, u1.[Name] AS CreateUserName, a.[CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, a.[ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, u2.[Name] AS ModifyUserName, a.[ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.Category, a.Sort ASC, a.GroupName DESC) AS RowIndex FROM [Dynamic].[ExtensionProperty] a LEFT JOIN [RBAC].[User] u1 ON a.CreateUserId=u1.Id LEFT JOIN [RBAC].[User] u2 ON a.ModifyUserId=u2.Id
) SELECT * FROM CTE WHERE RowIndex BETWEEN (#PageIndex#-1)*#PageSize#+1 AND #PageIndex#*#PageSize# ORDER BY RowIndex ASC
